basic.description: This course provides an introduction to oral advocacy and preparation of factums in small classes of approximately 16 students. Students will prepare facta and oral argument in teams of four, and argue their case in a moot at the conclusion of the course. Students are evaluated by letter grade.   (To be offered jointly with LAW-325.) Three term-hours; Winter. Gleitman.
basic.subject: LAW
basic.title: Appellate Advocacy - Moots
